channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Kiwi The Knight And The Qashqai
channel.desc: Anna Williams is New Zealand's only know Oriental rug repairer. She learnt her trade in the bazaars of Iran, Turkey, and Egypt. Unusual for a ?foreigner', she stays and works with the Qashqai nomads, honing her weaving and repairing skills. Here, where repairing is traditionally a man's job, and Anna is a curiosity when sitting with men in the bazaars. (R).
